p: Thus, from a standard oil solution of 2â€‰mg/mL, daughter (diluted) solutions were prepared by successive dilution in methanol. Then, at each concentration, a volume of a methanol solution of DPPH was added. The reaction mixture was incubated in the dark at room temperature for 30 minutes. The vitamin C and butylhydroxytoluene (BHT) were prepared in the same condition and then used as a standard.
